alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chester and southern York Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Union to 6 miles west of Chester to 12 miles northwest of Winnsboro. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, York, Chester, Newport, Lesslie, Fort Lawn, Lockhart, Sharon, Mcconnells and Richburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
